name: HIS 100
title: Historical Skills and Methods
description: Designed to introduce history majors to historical methods and provide preparation for exit seminars. Students develop critical reading, historical analysis, research, and disciplinary writing skills.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: proposed and declared history majors, or by permission of the instructor.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to proposed and declared history majors, or by permission of the instructor.
